message: We are proud to present our premium quality product. Given its exceptional standards, we believe it offers unparalleled value. At a fixed price of $10000, we invite you to experience the difference that quality makes.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the next product.

Thank you for considering our product. With a 80% chance of being high-quality, each item represents a unique opportunity to own something truly exceptional. Despite the investment required, the long-term benefits and satisfaction from owning a top-tier product make it a worthwhile choice. We look forward to your decision.
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product. I believe the potential reward is worth the risk.

We understand that every product has a chance to be of lower quality, but rest assured, the vast majority (80%) of our products exceed expectations. This one, however, might not live up to the same standards as our previous offerings. Given the price and the risk involved, we hope you're prepared for the possibility that this product may not meet your expectations.
